subject: Slowed it down a bit,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_10bbf.75baf1db.3c277ad8_boundary

	boundary="part1_10bbf.75baf1db.3c277ad8_alt_boundary"


--part1_10bbf.75baf1db.3c277ad8_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Ok, here it is, the same file, only slowed down a bit, I also put its  
reverse all on same side, and slowed it down a little bit, and tried to  space 
it out more, but the man's voice almost  covers over my moms, I  believe it 
to be the Angel that went to bring her down to talk, she is  far away over 
there, and Angels usually have to go and get her.  Not  to brag but, my mother 
is very high ranking over there, as her sibs put her  through such hell and 
turmoil while she was alive on this Earth, but now  she ranks way over 
them.  She had such a difficult life when she was here  on the Earth plane.  Was 
robbed of even her own clothes, pictures,  jewerly, and her books, 
furniture by greed of two  other sibs.  She was left with nothing, at least she had 
her self  respect, and now is high up in the Heavenly realms.   sf
--part1_10bbf.75baf1db.3c277ad8_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
